list-item.p: Steroidal alkaloids: conarrhimine, conessine, holantosines a, b, c, d, e and f, holarrhessimine, holarrhidine, holarrhine, holonamine, hydroxyconessine, kurchiline, kurchine, kurchiphylline, norconessine, n,n,n′,n′tetramethylholarrhenine, holacin, kurchinine, conamine, holadysine, 12-hydroxyconessimine, holarrhimine, holadysamine, conessimine, isoconessimine, holarosine a, conessidine, kurchiphyllamine, 7α-hydroxyconessine [ 26, 27].
Triterpenes: betulinaldehyde, ursolic acid, lupeol, 20(29)-lupadien-3β-ol, betulinic acid, lupeol β-hydroxyhexad-ecanoate [ 29, 30].
